Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
animation.AnimationAnimations are sequences of images and the logic needed to know when, where, and how to display them
animationmanager.AnimationManagerThe AnimationManager class handles loading and instantiating Animations and their Polygons
data.objects.attacks.baseattack.BaseAttackThis class represents a simple melee attack, with a bounding polygon, a duration, a positional offset from another object, and a damage rating
block.BlockBlocks are solid, nonmoving bits of terrain
mapeditor.BlockUIElementThis is a simple UI element for handling clicking on the blocks in the map editor
uielement.ButtonUIElementThis class represents an object that can be clicked on
camera.CameraThe camera is used to determine the center of the viewscreen
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.climbingstate.ClimbingStateThis class handles objects that are climbing up from a ledge
collisiondata.CollisionDataCollisionData stores the information of a single collision with another object
configmanager.ConfigManagerThis class loads general game configuration information (e.g
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.crawlingstate.CrawlingStateThis class handles objects that are crawling on the ground
data.objects.creatures.darkclone.darkclone.DarkCloneStandard "evil clone" of the player
dynamicclassmanager.DynamicClassManagerThis class handles loading dynamic classes out of the data directory
enveffect.EnvEffectEnvironmental effects are localized changes in physics or display
enveffectmanager.EnvEffectManagerThis class handles loading and caching information on enviromental effects
eventmanager.EventThis class represents a single input event
eventmanager.EventManagerThis class handles user input and other events
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.fallingstate.FallingStateThis class handles objects that are in freefall
featuremanager.FeatureManagerThis class manages the different map feature modules in data/mapgen/features
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.flinchstate.FlinchStateThis class handles creatures that are flinching after getting hit
floatingplatform.FloatingPlatformA simple container class for platforms that we plan to add to the map during mapgen
font.FontIdentifiers for text alignment
fontmanager.FontManagerThis class handles loading fonts and making them available for rendering
furniture.FurnitureFurniture is a placed item on the map that the player can interact with (like terrain) but that is not placed on the block grid, generally because it's too big to fit into a single square
furnituremanager.FurnitureManagerMuch like SceneryManager, this class loads the furnitureConfig files that describe what furniture to place and how
gameobjectmanager.GameObjectManagerThis class handles all dynamic (i.e
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.groundedattackstate.GroundedAttackStateThis class handles objects that are attacking while on the ground
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.groundedstate.GroundedStateThis class handles objects that are standing on the ground
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.hangingstate.HangingStateThis class handles objects that are hanging from a ledge
imagemanager.ImageManagerThis class handles loading and display of images
data.objects.base.terrestrialstates.jumpingstate.JumpingStateThis class handles objects that have jumped into the air
line.LineLines are simple pairs of points
logger.LoggerThis class simply performs logging and tracks the current log level
map.MapThe Map class handles creating, updating, and displaying the game map
mapeditor.MapEditorThis class allows you to edit the currently-loaded map
mapeditor.MapUIElementThis UI element handles creating and destroying blocks
objectstate.ObjectStateThe ObjectState class encapsulates logic specific to a given game object's current state (e.g
physicsobject.PhysicsObjectPhysicsObject is the base class for objects that need to interact with other objects, like creatures, mechanisms, etc
data.mapgen.features.pit.PitWhen horizontal, this tunnel type puts a pit trap at the bottom and fills it with something unpleasant
data.objects.creatures.player.player.PlayerThe Player class handles the player's avatar in the game
quadtree.QuadTreeQuadTree instances are nodes in a recursive quad tree used to hold 2D objects
zone.RegionA Region is a specific portion of terrain within a given Zone
scenery.SceneryScenery are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty
scenerymanager.SceneryManagerThe SceneryManager class handles loading scenery configuration and selection of scenery items depending on terrain
seed.SeedSeeds are used by the spacefilling automaton in map.expandSeeds()
uielement.SimpleUIElementThis class is a simple UIElement that can be configured at instantiation to respond to a specific input event and take some action
soundmanager.SoundManagerThis class handles loading and playing of sound effects
splashscreen.SplashScreenThis class handles the splash screen display at the start of the game
sprite.SpriteSprites are display classes for handling dynamic game objects like creatures
data.mapgen.features.stairs.StairsTunnelAugment the floor of the tunnel with extra blocks to create a staircase
data.mapgen.features.straight.StraightTunnelThe basic tunnel type -- a straight tunnel from point A to point B
terraininfo.TerrainInfoTerrainInfo is a container class that describes the local terrain, which determines the graphics used for terrain blocks, the available background props, the selection of tunnel types, and so on
data.objects.base.terrestrialobject.TerrestrialObjectTerrestrial objects are ones that walk around on the ground and can jump
treenode.TreeNodeTreeNodes are branches of a planar tree graph that are used to describe the high-level structure of the game map
uielement.UIElementThis class handles user interface objects that can interact with the EventManager that processes the event queue
data.mapgen.environments.water.WaterThis class defines an environmental effect that creates pools of water on the map
data.mapgen.features.wave.WaveTunnelCarve a sinusoidal wave tunnel from the self.sector's parent to its endpoint
zone.ZoneA Zone is a large-scale grouping of similar Region instances
